title: Refusing to become a manager is more common in France than elsewhere
subhead: According to an international survey by Cegos, a significant share of employees showed little interest in becoming managers, especially in France. The reasons include organizational culture, the image of the managerial role and the emergence of alternative models of professional success.

title: 'A furnace': Life under Paris's zinc roofs during a heatwave
subhead: On Saturday, the French capital faced a heatwave, with temperatures reaching up to 36°C. The residents of the city's 'chambres de bonne,' small top-floor flats, struggled to cope.
